name: Win2Flash

screenshots.caption: GUI for Copying a custom install.wim & autounattend.xml to the right place

summary: tool to make a bootable flash drive
short_description:
Please be sure to back all data on your flash drive as I WILL NOT BE RESPONSIBLE FOR YOUR LOST DATA!

Disable your antivirus as it will kill the app when autorun.inf is detected.

UPDATE: 
Fixed: a problem that caused the program not to load!

Added: UEFI Support

This tool "Win2Flash" will assist you in turning your flash drive into a bootable windows vista/7/8 flash drive. 

NOTE: this program will NOT work for Win 7 x64 UEFI Mode Unless the Current System is running Win 7 x64. this is due to me not knowing how to extract the needed file from the install.wim via batch file. right now if your running Win 7 x64 it will copy the needed file from the system...

Please Report any BUGS.

this program was compressed using 7-Zip if you have problems extracting then please download & install 7-Zip for your system.

Please read the README.txt for more details.

Want to support development? click the "Win2Flash Web Site >" below to open my PayPal donation page!
